short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance productivity with website blocking, time tracking, break reminders, and insightful statistics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusFlow is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you stay productive and manage your time more effectively. With FocusFlow, you can:

Block distracting websites to avoid unnecessary interruptions.
Track how much time you spend on specific websites.
Receive break reminders to prevent burnout.
Analyze your activity statistics and gain insights on how to improve your work habits.
